channel.title: Projects on Joshua Manton
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Joshua Manton

item.title: Puzzle Game
item.description: A game where you push blocks around and use the power of mathematics to interact with the world around you and solve puzzles.

item.title: Compiler
item.description: A toy compiler project I started working on mostly to learn how compilers work. Source: https://github.com/JoshuaManton/lang. Demo: https://github.com/JoshuaManton/lang/blob/master/demo.lang
